Package com.netspective.sparx.xif.db

Provides database management functionality; this includes overall schema management and RDBMS DDL generation, meta-data management, and connection pooling (perferably using JNDI, but not necessarily).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DatabaseContext Provides an interface for obtaining a default or named JDBC Connection object; the implementations of this interface should manage connection pooling.
DatabasePolicy  
 

Class Summary
DatabaseContextFactory Provides a factory pattern for constructing DatabaseContext instances.
 

Package com.netspective.sparx.xif.db Description

Provides database management functionality; this includes overall schema management and RDBMS DDL generation, meta-data management, and connection pooling (perferably using JNDI, but not necessarily). This package differs from the com.netspective.sparx.xaf.sql package in that it provides overall database management functionality such as connection management and schema management whereas the sql package provides for SQL statement pooling and SQL generation.
